name: CyberJunk
description:
--WELCOME TO INTERNET--

In this game you must shoot the blocks to push them away and destroy the block called "heart". The task will be more difficult by modified blocks that will shoot at you or defend the "heart".

Stone block- it is a common block. It will kill you only if you are in of it.
Shieldblock-this block create a structure (shield). heartblock- this is a main block of Boss Ship
Cannon thrower- it drop a bombs at you
Heart blocker- it defend heart from bullets
Gun block- follow you and shoot at you bullets

 ---BEAT THE VIRUS---
---GOOD LUCK---
